channel.title: Megaman Zero mod! [Video]
channel.description:
Hey everyone - if you remember way back to last summer, I released a mod that was more or less a fan service mod for Megaman Zero fans. Well, I finally updated it to 1.5.2 and Forge Mod Loader, as well as made a video overviewing it. If you'd like to see it, then here it is:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vyzRO9lGH4k
All details about it can be seen there, and the recipes for those planning to use it can be found in a link in its description. Its simply, but more will be added soon. I'd also love it if some of you played around with it and gave me suggestions for what to change, add or fix. I'm pretty much a one man development team, so I'd love some input!
